```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(officedown)

source("r_docs/R/styles_variables_functions.R")

```

```{r loop fpar add function}
block_add_fps_fun <- function(x, list) {
  for (i in length(list):1) {
    for (j in length(list[[i]]):1) {
      body_add(x, list[[i]][[j]], style = list[[i]][[j]]$style)
    }
  }
  return(x)
}
```

```{r final doc build}
if (doc_type == "notes") {
  final_build <- list(
    heading, 
    background_facts
    )
} else if (doc_type == "causation") {
  final_build <- list(
    heading,
    receipt,
    purpose,
    qualifications,
    background_facts,
    inj_biomech$intro,
    inj_biomech$meat,
    three_steps,
    conclusions,
    signature_block,
    ifelse(plaintiff$injury_location == "disk", appendix, NULL)
  )
} else if (doc_type == "rebuttal") {
  final_build <- list(
    heading,
    receipt,
    purpose,
    summary_opinions,
    qualifications,
    background_facts,
    opinions_general_comments,
    inj_biomech$intro,
    inj_biomech$meat,
    three_steps,
    conclusions,
    signature_block
  )
}
```

```{r function call}
#fps function call
doc %>%
  cursor_begin() %>%
  body_remove() %>%
  block_add_fps_fun(final_build) %>%
  #body_add(fpar(run_wordtext("Here's the thing that will be invisible!"))) %>%
  print(target = "FRA-report-output.docx")
```
